name: Coshocton Village Inn & Suites

reviews.text: I stayed here for one night while traveling on business. Front desk was very friendly and gave great suggestions for dinner. My room was very large with a full size kitchen. Bed was quite comfy with good quality pillows. Did not use pool/hot tub but it looked very clean. Not much to the fitness room. Very close to Roscoe Village, a local attraction.
reviews.title: Very Nice!

reviews.text: I will stay here again when in the area.
reviews.title: Loved it!!
Homey and practical, genuine service
reviews.text: This is a very nice place to stay. The room was beautiful...indoor pool...exercise room...complimentary breakfast...very nice. I loved it!!

Picture a Carlson Country Inn and Suites, minus the Carlson. This was a classic, midwestern, small-town country inn. Had many business perks, including frequent stay program, free breakfast, pool and small gym. What you'll notice here is very nice, genuine service from the front desk, and a more mixed demographic crowd (blue plus white collar, construction plus consultants, retirees and random families). So, it's probably the best option in this small town. Room was typical 2*, with the free stuff in the bathroom, movies for rent, clean, and basic. Nothing fancy here, but quite a deal for the price. Perfectly fine as a business hotel or a family trip across Ohio. Oh, you do have to pay for your own newspaper, unless you're in the frequent stay club, in which case you get the paper, plus a bottle of water, some in-room cookies, and other perks.
reviews.title: Pleasent stay and good location

reviews.text: This was our first stop inOhio on our road trip. We had travelled down from our overnight stay in Niagara falls and we wre to stay in Coshocton for 2 nights before moving on. Our main reason for staying here was that it was half way to our turnaround point in Catlettsburg, Kentucky plus Roscoe village sounded interesting. All our info was obtained off TA with the help of Irishlake the local expert for Ohio. Look her up.
reviews.title: Very Good Experience

description: Coshocton Village Inn and Suites stands out among other hotels in Coshocton offering comfortable and spacious accommodations, free wifi throughout the hotel, indoor pool, sauna, hot tub, exercise room plus a variety of services and amenities perfect for families, business travelers, bus groups or special occasions.
